title: Indigenous
common: This list comprises families with at least one known indigenous ancestor, some of whom were later regarded as Europeans by their descendants in an attempt to avoid interracial mixing (Schneider, Alberto L., 2016, pp. 99-100) and elevate their social status.

Some previously published families have been temporarily hidden until the standardization process is complete. Although they are not currently visible here, they remain available in the GitHub repository (History Tracers, Github).
The families can be updated at any time based on new research.

value.name: Inca (Tawantinsuyu):
value.desc: Refers to the rulers, known as Sapa) Inca, of the Inca Empire, also called Tawantinsuyu.
